data.eml:eml: Taxonomic study of the genus Glyphipterix Hübner (Lepidoptera: Glyphipterigidae: Glyphipteriginae) from Mainland China

This dataset contains the digitized treatments in Plazi based on the original journal article Liu, Tengteng, Li, Houhun (2014): Taxonomic study of the genus Glyphipterix Hübner (Lepidoptera: Glyphipterigidae: Glyphipteriginae) from Mainland China. Zootaxa 3821 (1): 1-25, DOI: http://dx.doi.org/10.11646/zootaxa.3821.1.1
